sitelen pi kalama lili ale - syllable glyphs

These glyphs cover the syllables of toki pona. Aside from the word glyphs, any word can also be built from these syllable gyphs. The glyphs are arranged below in five column groups, to help orient you to the components from which each block is built.

note: There is no ji ti wo or wu in toki pona, so these spaces are blank.

a
e
i
o
u
an
en
in
on
un

je
jo
ju
